website_summaries.verdict: Spaghetti pasta is arguably the most popular available, and this one is no exception – flavorful, easy to cook, and affordable.
pros: This classic spaghetti tops our list for being a versatile pasta suitable for countless dishes
It's also easy to cook and is made by a trusted brand in the pasta business
cons: Nothing fancy, but often spaghetti pasta is just what cooks need

customer_reviews.title: Good Pasta, but the CEO put me off buying it ever again
customer_reviews.text: It was good pasta, but I stopped buying Barilla because of their CEO's homophobia. Don't get me wrong, he has every right to his opinion, but he won't be getting my money when there are plenty of other pastas out there that are just as good if not better. I'll pay the extra fifty cents to get a brand that doesn't feel the need to bash an entire demographic as unworthy of consuming their products.
customer_reviews.author: CasualOtaku

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: $5 for a box of spaghetti noodles??! I cancelled my order.
customer_reviews.author: Marlyin A.

customer_reviews.title: Superior Pasta
customer_reviews.text: This brand is simply the best I have ever cooked. The salted boiling water is never milky after the pasta finishes cooking. The pasta is smooth, never grainy and rarely sticks together after the initial stirring. The flavor is excellent and holds up no matter how spicy the sauce. Unused portions can be placed in a plastic container for up to a week and never sours. Barilla knows how to make pasta!
customer_reviews.author: V. Fox

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Fit Between Thick and Thin pasta
customer_reviews.text: If you are a pasta-holic like I am, you will try any and all pasta with a variety of sauces and/or "gravies". This one is, in a word, magnifico!. My other half likes Angel Hair pasta specifically for the thinness and is not overly fond of linguine because it is thicker. This "Fini" pasta fit perfect into her taste as well as mine. We have made this pasta al dente as well as softer. With either you still get the texture of a linguine plus almost any variety of sacue/gravy will adhere very well. If you love pasta you will not be disappointed in either the flavor or the value. Yes, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cardione1Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Thin Spaghetti
customer_reviews.text: Barilla Pasta is a delicious pasta that our family has bought for years. The pasta cooks up quickly, has a great flavor and mouthfeel, and goes perfectly with a wide variety of sauces. The thin spaghetti is one of our favorites - it's not quite as thick as standard spaghetti, but not as fine as Angel Hair Pasta...it's definitely the kids favorite thickness for spaghetti as it is easy to slurp up with good sauce! The pastas are reasonably priced and the quality is great - it's a staple I'll continue keeping in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chan

customer_reviews.title: it's the only spaghetti worth eating
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people don't like spaghetti because the sauce slips off and the noodle is slippery. Not so with Barilla Spaghetti Rigati. It holds the sauce with superior texture. This is no longer sold in the stores in our area, but it's the only spaghetti worth eating. It has made us a once a week spaghetti family because of it's superior flavor and texture
customer_reviews.author: Evie99

customer_reviews.title: Not ANGEL HAIR PASTA
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my subscribe and save items because my family loves pasta. Amazon changed the product description from THIN SPAGHETTI to ANGEL HAIR PASTA. This product is NOT ANGEL HAIR PASTA. It is THIN SPAGHETTI, a great spaghetti product. I can't eat regular spaghetti because it feels like worms. The thickness of the THIN SPAGHETTI is just right for my family. We love this product. It cooks in 5 minutes, and is just right. Today I discovered that the outer box was water damaged. So I changed my overall rating from 5 to 2 due to the water damaged that probably occurred in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: R R R

customer_reviews.title: Healthy stock item alternative to instant noodles
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these boxes (pack of twenty) about half a year ago - boy was this a good purchase. I kept the pasta boxes out in room temperature but they're still good when cooked. Even with pretty judicious pasta eating every other day or so the box just lasts and lasts without spoiling. Just occasionally get some fresh veggies and seafood/meat and you end up with a healthy and tasty meal at around the same price as if you were living on instant noodles. Your complexion and kidneys will thank you later. Another extra benefit of going for angel hair pasta is that it cooks really fast!
customer_reviews.author: φοινικικός

customer_reviews.title: What  a mess
customer_reviews.text: I received boxes of this item the boxes wwre wet and pasta outside of boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting & Reasonably Priced- however packaging was missing one of the items
customer_reviews.text: This is great dried pasta and very reasonably priced. Only one issue is that we were supposed to receive 20 16-0unce packages and there were only 19 packages in the box when we received it. We are missing a package however I don't know how to contact the seller to request shipment of the missing package.
customer_reviews.author: L. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Best pasta ever
customer_reviews.text: We used to live in Italy for more than 2 years. My Italian friends would always use Barilla brand pasta when they had guests for dinner. Unlike the US grocery stores, the markets in Italy literally have multiple long aisles of pasta... different brands and different shapes. I soon learned that you are supposed to match the shape of the pasta with the style of sauce that it will be mixed with. It's rather scientific.
customer_reviews.author: E. White

customer_reviews.title: Pasta for EVERYTHING at a wonderful price
customer_reviews.text: I love this pasta for not only making spaghetti but my mom would make 'Baked Spaghetti ". (Done by first cooking the pasta then place it in an 8" x 13" baking pan. The you hae melted done Kraft Velvitta Cheese (the complete box) and a SMALL amount of milk and then poor over the pasta in the baking ban and bake at 350 until a very light golden brown)
customer_reviews.author: DrBarron

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Find at a Grocery Store
customer_reviews.text: My local grocery carried Spaghetti Rigati for a short while, I suppose as a test and then they dropped it. Thankfully, I was able to find it on Amazon. We like it because the sauce sticks to the ribs on the pasta. I have used it to make traditional spaghetti, Carbonara, and in a variety of baked pasta recipes with great success. Excellent product. Hint: Do NOT rinse it after cooking it Al Dente.
customer_reviews.author: KeeversDad

customer_reviews.title: Good pasta, but arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I love the pasta as a product, but it's always hit or miss ordering any thing from Prime Pantry, one box of the spaghetti I ordered was damaged, it somehow got wet, I'm assuming from the vinegar (even though that was well sealed in plastic, but the box did smell vinegary.) Nothing else in the box got wet, so I wonder if it got wet before it went into the box. It's a mystery to me! I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Laura on Irish Hill

customer_reviews.title: Just like all the other pasta you have ever eaten.  Do you really need a review?
customer_reviews.text: A very interesting flavor.... I had to add sauce to make it edible, and, yada yada its pasta. Is it even possible to buy bad pasta from a major brand? This was as good as it gets.... pasta. The box got thrashed in amazon shipping, but whatever, I didn't buy it take pictures of it! Its cheap pasta!!!
customer_reviews.author: Doofydog

customer_reviews.title: ~~Really nice pasta~~
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor, good value for my money and presentation is nice. I always have angel hair pasta on hand in my pantry for the winter months. Am stocking early this year and this is one item I always purchase. Prime Pantry carries it and will order again if I run out. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity...

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is now stocked up here for the pandemic (I hope). Spaghetti is important every week here & thin spaghetti is the favorite. It felt weird to get so much at one time...but I’m glad I have it now. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy3339

customer_reviews.title: Best pasta on the market for the price
customer_reviews.text: Barilla pasta is the best. Always cooked to perfection. I use this pasta only for all my dishes. Cooks adante
customer_reviews.author: M M NJ

customer_reviews.title: We’ve been Barilla users for about 20-years.
customer_reviews.text: Pasta preference is a matter of taste so all I can say is we like it and started buying it here because the food store jacked the price up about 30-percent. I also like that by adding a little oil to the water I can dispense with rinsing it and that’s a real plus. At about a buck a box it’s worth buying it here and it helps fill out that Pantry box.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Great option for when I don't want to make my own pasta. Received the product in a damaged free container and with a good expiration date. I love homemade pasta but this stuff is okay when you just don't feel like cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Ed P.

customer_reviews.title: Barilla is quality! Angel Hair should be AlDenté! Don’t Overcook!
customer_reviews.text: Barilla is an excellent brand I’ve store bought for years. Better bargain on Amazon! This Angel Hair Pasta is great so many ways. Just know the Angel Hair is thinner than Spaghetti noodles & even Vermicelli. Time it! Don’t Overcook it! Remember, AlDenté!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Unless you are willing to spend extra..
customer_reviews.text: ..for artisanal pastas, Barilla is the benchmark standard for pasta. Barilla cooks al dente with ease and stays firm. The flavor is consistently delicious. Non-GMO and now made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Max™

customer_reviews.title: Same product!
customer_reviews.text: I know people worry about fake or expired food products. I ordered these through prime pantry and they are the real deal! As for the noodles, I’ve never had an issue preparing them! They are wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Fi

customer_reviews.title: It's pasta and not bad, but not fresh, but it is a carb
customer_reviews.text: What can you say, it's pasta. Throw it at your cabinet while cooking to see if it's done if it sticks it's done. but Don't cook for like 5 minutes on boiling or you get nice starch water, maybe can mold it into clay if you let it dry enough, My roommate isn't the best at the cookings.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Love this Angel Hair Pasta!
customer_reviews.text: I really love Barilla Angel Hair Pasta, & was happy to find it on Amazon Pantry. (& it was a better price than I typically pay at the grocery store, so that's a score!). This is super easy to make, & it always comes out great. I like the Angel Hair pasta rather than the spaghetti because the Angel Hair is a thinner noodle. I like it with pasta sauce & sometimes with just plain butter. Really Tasty- 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Very inexpensive and great taste no questions about it
customer_reviews.text: Very inexpensive and great taste no questions about it, just don't do it for me because who wants to consume empty calories at the expense of your weight and health? Carbohydrates are fine and Keto fans in my opinion are crazy but enough is enough in the cabs category. Sweet potatoes, oatmeal and brown rice are a far better option and available over the counter nation wide.
customer_reviews.author: Matt 190

customer_reviews.title: Barilla spaghetti, 16 ounce
customer_reviews.text: Barilla Spaghetti may just be the best spaghetti on the market. Theses definitely my family's favorite and so easy to cook to have it the favorite. I do like the one pound packages because it is just the size for a large family and I know how to half the package for a family of four. Directions on box are perfect for cooking just right for the pasta sauce. My spaghetti came from Amazon and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Excellent al dente
customer_reviews.text: Excellent al dente! Holds its form very well, and is wonderful when a bit of vodka sauce fills the middle...hungry now! Although I still laugh at the fact that "ITALY'S #1 BRAND OF PASTA" is made in the Good Ol' US of A! Learned that when looking for International foods for an extra credit project my children were doing for school. Needed one more product, grabbed the Barilla, read the origin, and said "What the heck?!" Finally found another, not as good, pasta half way down the aisle that was made in Italy! LOL!!!
customer_reviews.author: JET

customer_reviews.title: Like them so much
customer_reviews.text: They cook faster in boiling water and much less sodium content than Asian dry noodles. Texture changes with the time of boiling, tender to soft, enjoyable with or without soup.
customer_reviews.author: Bing & Carol

customer_reviews.title: Best brand for Spagetti
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brand so far! Tastes just like the Italian Spagetti!
customer_reviews.author: K. D.

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Barilla pasta is a good pasta brand from Italy. I have no complaints about this product. It arrived in great condition without any broken noodles. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing pasta! Love the flavor! This is better flavor than homemade pasta. I use it in different recipes and also made a dessert with it with milk and it tasted awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Swati

customer_reviews.title: Had me some great psgetti :-)
customer_reviews.text: This was fresh and good, cooked up perfect good thing amazon pantry got it here in perfect shape. Side notes: How do you get it off the wall :-)
customer_reviews.author: M. Welk

customer_reviews.title: Good penne
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand, and I was thankful to find some penne on Amazon. I use penne for many dishes and have been satisfied with the quality and taste of this kind
customer_reviews.author: LMichele

customer_reviews.title: Great for macaroni salad!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to make macaroni salad with these. She had veggies and it is a beautiful salad. This is also great with sauce.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: reliable staple
customer_reviews.text: The price of this pantry staple is perfect for all of us who are budget watchers. It is a versatile ingredient serving as either a side dish or a main course.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Delicious  Linguini
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this brand of linguini! I plan on making TONS of linguini with white clam sauce with LOADS of garlic and parsley! Yo ho ho!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is very convenient to have at home whenever you need a pack of spaghetti to make for dinner. Barilla is good pasta and I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: kmc12

customer_reviews.title: Good Spaghetti
customer_reviews.text: This was really good spaghetti and it cooked really well too. Was surprised that it took less time than other brands. Will buy again later.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Strnad

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Pasta
customer_reviews.text: It is pasta what more can I say. No different than you would buy in the store but it did arrive fresh (not expired) and the packaging was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysi

customer_reviews.title: Great thin noodles, dark packaging
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, cooks well and cooks quickly due to the thinness of the noodle. The packaging is dark, for those needing to avoid darks I would recommend removing the noodles from the box and placing them in a tightly sealed container for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L.

customer_reviews.title: A decent pasta
customer_reviews.text: We like this pasta, and I particularly like the angel hair. It cooks as you'd expect, and it tastes as you'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: B4

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite spaghetti. It's just the right thickness and does in fact cook up quickly in ten minutes. I can't travel to stores so it's great to be able to get this pack of 8
customer_reviews.author: Dale C. Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Barilla Thin Spaghetti
customer_reviews.text: Great for Bolognese, Alfredo, Seafood, Veggie and other pasta dishes you can imagine. This is what you need! Fits well in any Italian spaghetti recipes! Available at any local supermarket too.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre

customer_reviews.title: VERY well worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived intact, better than my local supermarket, as a matter of fact. No broken pieces. Fresh. Great product. And a great value. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Judah Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item inside!
customer_reviews.text: This item is listed as Spaghetti Rigati. Unfortunately when I opened the box today I found regular spaghetti. Very disappointing indeed! Unfortunately, I missed my return window so I’m stuck. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: N. L. Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Hateful Company
customer_reviews.text: The pasta is perfectly fine, but I'd rather buy equal tasty carbs from companies that do not discriminate upon individuals for their sexual orientation (or any other factor).
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Linguine Fini instead of Fettuccine
customer_reviews.text: Love Barilla and like the large shells they make I was very disappointed when the stores in my area stopped carrying the Linguine Fini also. I use this instead of Fettuccine when making home made Alfredo with grilled chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Best pasta
customer_reviews.text: I eat pasta a lot..Ive bought expensive and cheap..For my money this is the best..never mushy..and it cooks up better than 15 dollar a pound pasta ive purchased..now i can have it delivered for around a dollar a box..thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: Dcorderoreyes

customer_reviews.title: This is great everyday pasta that cooks up great
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to pasta for everyday use, it's always fresh tasting and routinely cooked al dente for a superb meal.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Best pasta and only one we use in this Italian house. Easy to cook and absorbs the Sauce (NOT GRAVY) very well!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dynamite

customer_reviews.title: Pantry purchase for college kid!
customer_reviews.text: I send my son who is away at college food through pantry. It's great and convenient and price effective. At least I know he's eating more than fast food every meal.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Versteeg

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to itself badly.
customer_reviews.text: This sticks to itself very bad. Otherwise i like it but do not walk away. Keep stirring it to prevent the sticking
customer_reviews.author: Sally Greimes

customer_reviews.title: Nice quantity of Barilla to keep in the house
customer_reviews.text: We love having quantities of spaghetti in the pantry so that someone will cook for him or for themselves once in awhile. And Barilla is a good quality brand.
customer_reviews.author: alison859

customer_reviews.title: Quick cooking pasta
customer_reviews.text: Angel hair pasta makes dinner so fast. Takes longer to boil the water than to cook the pasta. Always happy with Barilla quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joanjag

customer_reviews.title: Shorted on pasta
customer_reviews.text: packaging was beaten up and obviously retaped. Actual product had one less box than advertised
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for a great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how the ridges help the pasta grab sauce! I’ll never go back to regular spaghetti. It’s awesome to have a surplus on hand like this, it’s nice to know I can come up with a quick meal everyone will love!
customer_reviews.author: Becky‘Smith

customer_reviews.title: Seriously one of the best....
customer_reviews.text: Al dente can be achieved with this wonderful pasta which is never gummy or sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: We eat a good bit of different pastas so this is one we use a lot of. Really good.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: The best spaghetti on the market was not able to get it in our stores, along with many other products
customer_reviews.author: Lor

customer_reviews.title: good pasta at a good price
customer_reviews.text: solid pasta, silky and is an excellent value....Barilla pastas are always right on the mark for not a lot of money
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: I be Afta my Pasta
customer_reviews.text: Every time I want to make my delicious Baskeghetti I reach for my Barilla Pasta! I like the cardboard box shape.. easy to stack in my pantry and as a mom, that's important to me. The pasta is even more better when its been boiled. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good.
customer_reviews.text: These are good but only buy it when it's on sale or $1 since there's good alternatives.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient quality
customer_reviews.text: This was for our church food bank. So convenient to order in bulk & ship direct quickly.
customer_reviews.author: tina y meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great Italian Staple!
customer_reviews.text: Penne pasta has been the pasta of our choice around our house for years. I grew up eating spaghetti noodles but have since switched to these. Excellent choice for homemade Alfredo sauce. I will keep purchasing these!
customer_reviews.author: 2015 Challenger Scat Pack Shaker Guy

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Gluten!
customer_reviews.text: Fad diet gluten-free people don't know what they're missing. This is awesome spaghetti at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: not good food
customer_reviews.text: This noodle is very unpalatable and hard to cook. I won't buy it next time.
customer_reviews.author: Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great product and delicious! I am a recurring customer I buy this product all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and delicious! I am a recurring customer I buy this product all the time.

customer_reviews.title: It's spaghetti
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering spaghetti with fiber. It's ok, but I prefer spaghetti with fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Bert C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for spaghetti dishes
customer_reviews.text: This is great spaghetti. It is better with sauce than the classic smooth shape. Sauce clings better, nice weight. Not super light like angel hair or clunky like the medium spaghetti size.
customer_reviews.author: Merilyn

customer_reviews.title: Performed well, and that soft and mushy but al dente
customer_reviews.text: Great pasta, Performed well, and that soft and mushy but al dente

customer_reviews.title: A keeper
customer_reviews.text: This pasta holds up to sauce or just butter. Some get mushy but I've never had that problem with this one

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Pasta!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pasta! Just the right thickness and great flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and a pantry staple
customer_reviews.text: We always stock lots of this in our pantry and it's reliable and a great go-to for everyone.

customer_reviews.title: Don't order this! You probably won't get it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm assuming this is a good product - it's Barilla. Wish I had it - still waiting since May 16th

customer_reviews.title: It's dinner time
customer_reviews.text: Some ground beef and jar of tomato basil sauce. Have main course in less than 30 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Noodles
customer_reviews.text: I like the price right the quality the packing was excellent.... Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Cook shorter
customer_reviews.text: Don't cook as long as they say, they taste better that way.

customer_reviews.title: Always the best
customer_reviews.text: Braille is number 1 brand pasta in my family !

customer_reviews.title: Botched packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product was not in the box, and several other items were damaged.

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Pasta
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic pasta. No frills, nothing gourmet but a good price. If you can't make pasta at home, this is a good substitute.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMistress

customer_reviews.title: We love Barilla pasta.
customer_reviews.text: We can find more shapes here than in the stores so we order them here. The shapes please the eye and make the meals look different.
customer_reviews.author: Musicbird

customer_reviews.title: Great pasta keeper!!THANK YOU!!T!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE PASTA!! ONLY PASTA USE HOME!! KEEPER!! AROUND LONG TIME!! THANK YOU!! T!!

customer_reviews.title: These items were not among the items actually delivered. Please deliver them, as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Two of the three boxes were delivered open. Barilla Pasta, Thin Spaghetti, 16 Ounce (Pack of 20) $33.89 Sold by: Amazon.com Services LLC TruBrain Drinks – 1oz (30mL) Shot / Bottle, Box of 20 – ​Nootropic Brain Designed by Neuroscientists to Boost Mental Output & Improve Memory ​Nootropic​ Supplement​
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I buy this brand or cremette spaghetti noodles .both great .only brands I buy .
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY, LEARN HOW TO COOK THIS PASTA. . YOU PUT YOUR STEAK N SHAKE CHILE IN POT WITH CAN OF WATER AND THE NOODLES EXSORB WATER AN DINNER IS DONE.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA RICOTTA

customer_reviews.title: First Time was The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I had never cooked spaghetti in my life prior to ordering. These noodles had so many good reviews I had to order and the price was cheaper than Walmart. The noodles came out so soft and with my Farmer's Market Tomato and Basil Sauce, the combo didn't last long in the plates!! I will be ordering more as soon as I finish my second package of spaghetti.
customer_reviews.author: BulletProofed Fitness

customer_reviews.title: Delicious pasta
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in perfect condition. Expiration 2022. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect noodle for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Barilla is excellent pasta. It cooks quickly but is very easy to stop at al dente. Linguine fini is my favorite pasta. It is about the size of spaghetti but with a slightly flattened shape. This helps whatever sauce you are using to stick to the noodles better. Once you start using this pasta, you will never want to go back to your old pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm and fam

customer_reviews.title: Consistently good
customer_reviews.text: Folks often consider spaghetti as a delivery mechanism for sauce which is a real shame because pasta should be great tasting too. This tastes like what spaghetti should taste like just don't over-cook it.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Better than other products now on the market today.
customer_reviews.text: Last longer with you, much more filling. Using the same amount of other products, such as princess,etc.
customer_reviews.author: Biggysmall3.0

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: We keep several different pastas in the cabinet. This Barilla pasta is good. Not the cheapest but good.
customer_reviews.author: Hawgfan

customer_reviews.title: Premium Pasta, Pantry Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our family relies on Barilla for great pasta. I love that they come in boxes which are easier to neatly store in the pantry than bags are. Should Amazon decide to stock more styles of pasta in this brand, I would be even happier than I already am. If you have never tried Barilla, do yourself a favor and treat your family to the best there is aside from having to make it from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: PennyPincher

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box to put my new stock of spaghetti away, I was surprised to find ONLY 4 boxes of spaghetti and 4 boxes of penne. I was unaware that I ordered penne and thought I ONLY order the spaghetti.
customer_reviews.author: Bell K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Just what Walmart took off the shelves. The groves hold sauces very well!
customer_reviews.author: m rodgers

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pasta!
customer_reviews.text: I love Barilla pasta! It's perfect for all my Italian dishes.
customer_reviews.author: javaturtle

customer_reviews.title: Great pasta
customer_reviews.text: By far some of the best pasta out there. They make gluten free options that are also outstanding. We buy this brand all the time and it is by far one of our favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Momwith2boys

customer_reviews.title: Good for a variety.
customer_reviews.text: I have always just bought the normal spaghetti but I found this Angel Hair pasta and thought I'd give it a try. My son and me are big fans at least for something new to try. I think we will probably stick with regular spaghetti most of the time and occasionally buy this for something different every once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: DDerr

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. Do not over cook it it turns into mush.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ashby

customer_reviews.title: I like that Barilla does not use barley or rice flour ...
customer_reviews.text: Again, packages arrived a little beat up for the travel, but otherwise the same Barilla I get elsewhere. I like that Barilla does not use barley or rice flour in their pastas. I'm allergic to those things so this is my go-to pasta brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schoen

product_meta.title: BARILLA Blue Box Spaghetti Pasta, 16 oz. Boxes (Pack of 8), 8 Servings per Box - Non-GMO Pasta Made with Durum Wheat Semolina - Italy's #1 Pasta Brand - Kosher Certified Pasta
product_meta.description:
Style:Spaghetti 16oz 8 PackSpaghetti is the most popular pasta shape in Italy. The name comes from the Italian word spaghi, which means ""lengths of cord."" Spaghetti originates from the south of Italy and is commonly used with tomato sauces, fresh vegetables, or fish. BARILLA Spaghetti pasta is made with non-GMO ingredients.
At BARILLA, we're passionate about pasta. After all, we have been pasta makers since 1877. As an Italian family-owned food company, BARILLA pasta is synonymous with high quality and ""al dente"" perfection every time. Our spaghetti pasta is made from the finest durum wheat and are non-GMO verified, peanut-free and suitable for a vegan or vegetarian diet. Perfect for twirling in your favorite pasta sauce, too!
feature_bullets: SPAGHETTI PASTA: Give BARILLA Blue Box Spaghetti a twirl! No doubt it's the most fun pasta to eat and its delicious texture will please the whole family
BARILLA PASTA: Long, golden strands of pasta made with 100% durum wheat and purified water to deliver great taste and "al dente" texture every time

CREATE DELICIOUS PASTA MEALS: Pairs well with just about any type of pasta sauce or spaghetti sauce: from a simple tomato sauce to a hearty meat sauce, a chunky vegetable sauce or a creamy carbonara sauce
QUICK AND EASY TO COOK PASTA: "Al dente" perfection in 10-11 minutes
ENRICHED PASTA: BARILLA pasta is an enriched macaroni product containing thiamin, folic acid, iron, riboflavin and niacin, and has a low glycemic index to keep you fuller, longer
NON-GMO PASTA: Crafted with the highest quality Non-GMO durum wheat semolina
FREE FROM MAJOR ALLERGENS: This pasta is lactose, peanut, shell fish, fish, tree nut, and soy free; Suitable for vegetarians
KOSHER CERTIFIED PASTA: BARILLA Blue Box Spaghetti noodles are Kosher certified and made in the USA

BARILLA BLUE BOX PASTA: A pantry staple, people know the classic BARILLA Blue Box stands for quality and a perfectly "al dente" pasta texture every time. That's why BARILLA pasta has been an Italian favorite for over 140 years

GET INSPIRED WITH BARILLA: Enjoy the full range of BARILLA pasta and pasta sauces, including BARILLA Ready Pasta, BARILLA Protein+ protein pasta, BARILLA Whole Grain pasta, BARILLA Veggie pasta, BARILLA Gluten Free pasta and BARILLA Organic pasta

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
